home.name: Paul
home.description: Specialized in Data, business intelligence application development and data project management.
home.description2: I enjoy using my technical skills to solve business problems.
home.description3: Graduated from INSEEC Lyon in Data Analytics & Marketing Management.
home.description4: I also have a strong interest in task automation with n8n (agentic AI).

initiative.title: Initiative
initiative.description: Curious and organized, I know how to take initiatives and lead projects autonomously.

communication.title: Good Communicator
communication.description: Able to coordinate relationships with providers and partners in Agile/Scrum mode.

rigorous.title: Rigorous & Pedagogical
rigorous.description: Methodical in data analysis and able to transmit technical knowledge clearly.
